message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I received a bonus offer, but I'm not sure if I qualify for it. Can you check for me?

I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can take a look at your account and confirm your eligibility. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Emily Parker, my email is emily.p@example.com, and my date of birth is July 19, 1995.
Thanks, Emily. That's all correct! I can see that you are eligible for the 50% deposit match bonus up to $100. To qualify, you need to deposit a minimum of $20 and meet the wagering requirements.
Okay, and what are the wagering requirements?
The wagering requirement for this bonus is 30 times the bonus amount. This means if you receive a $50 bonus, you’ll need to wager $1,500 before you can withdraw any winnings.
Got it. Do all games count towards the wagering requirements?
Good question! Slots contribute 100% towards the wagering requirements, while table games like blackjack and roulette contribute 10%. Live dealer games do not count toward the requirement.
Thanks for clarifying. I think I’ll go ahead and deposit now.

You're very welcome, Emily! I'm glad I was able to help. Once you've made your deposit, the bonus will be applied automatically. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
